error.unauth: You're not properly logged in right now!

error.payment: Oh dear, I'm afraid there's been an error. We're sorry about that. Please contact kontakt@vivaconagua.org and include this payment ID.

not_found.headline: Ooops, unfortunately no suitable form was found
not_found.text:
Unfortunately, we have not found a suitable donation form.
Please send us a short message where the error occurred to kontakt@vivaconagua.org so that we can fix the problem.

headline.donate: DONATE NOW FOR CLEAN DRINKING WATER
headline.thanks: THANK YOU FOR YOUR DONATION FOR CLEAN DRINKING WATER

information.label: Important information:
information.info_1: Monthly donations can be canceled at any time.
information.info_2: Your donation is tax deductible. You will receive a donation receipt in February next year.
information.info_3: Viva con Agua uses your data exclusively for the administration of donations. We do not pass them on to third parties.
information.info_4: Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. is recognized as a non-profit organization by the Hamburg-Nord tax office. Tax number: 17/454/04711. Last notice dated 21.09.2020.

example.soap: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least 20 liters of soap for schools
example.filter: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least one water filter for a family
example.trees: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least 50 trees
example.workshop: With this amount you will support us e.g. with at least one hygiene workshop at a school

amount.label: You want to donate a different amount? No problem!

error.minAmount: Please select at least one amount from {0} {1}

abo.label: How often do you want to donate?

contactform.label: Personal details
contactform.additional: I would like to receive a donation receipt
contactform.required: *These are the details we definitely need from you.

company.error: Please enter the name of your company

email.error: Please enter a valid email address
email.info: This is not a required field, but we will send the donation receipts by e-mail and would appreciate it if you could provide us with your e-mail address..

selectCountry.label: Please select in which currency you would like to donate

de.title: Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V.
de.subtitle: Our association in Germany

payment.email: We need your email address at this point to be able to make the donation with this payment provider.

de.single:
I authorize Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. to collect payments from my account by direct debit. At the same time, I instruct my credit institution to accept the direct debit drawn from my account by Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V..
Note: I can demand reimbursement of the debited amount within eight weeks, beginning with the debit date. The conditions agreed with my credit institution shall apply.
de.subscription:
I authorize Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. to collect payments from my account by direct debit on the 15th of the following month. At the same time, I instruct my credit institution to accept the direct debit drawn from my account by Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V.
Note: I can demand within eight weeks, beginning with the debit date, the refund of the debited amount. The terms and conditions agreed with my credit institution shall apply

sepa.error: Please confirm the direct debit authorization

policies.label: With your donation you confirm to have read the {0}.

example.default: enables for example in our project country Uganda, even more people to get access to clean drinking water
example.soap: among other things, provided at least 20 liters of soap for schools in our project country Uganda.
example.filter: donated among other things, a water filter to another family in our project country Uganda.
example.trees: planted among others things, in our project country Uganda at least 50 trees.
example.workshop: facilitated among other things, another hygiene workshop at a school in our project country Uganda.

next.label: This is how it continues
next.email: You will receive a confirmation email from us immediately.
next.receipt:
You will receive your donation receipts in February next year.
If you need it sooner, you can always contact us at spenden@vivaconagua.org.

newsletter.text: In the meantime, you can sign up for our newsletter. Note: We currently only send our newsletter in German.
newsletter.success: Thank you for subscribing our newsletter!

knownfrom.label: Feel free to tell us how you know us:

dropdown.none: Other reason that is not mentioned here

comment.label:
You always wanted to tell us something?
Here is your chance - your message to our team.:
